thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com
thread.title: Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text: I never, ever thought I could get the same visceral experience from buying art online as opposed to a gallery...I have been proven wrong with Saatchi, four times now! I own 4 beautiful pieces: 1 photograph and 3 paintings. Delivery was easy; all pieces arrived in perfect condition and in a very very timely manner. I love the window-of-opportunity to return the piece if is not what suits you. So far I have been fortunate. The thing about Saatchi is: what other vehicle gathers SOOOO many options into one marketplace? My go-to gallery in our area is lovely, but there are often times I cannot find what I am looking for. The searching tools on Saatchi are brilliant (they don't always work 100% for me, but in theory, brilliant).
